entries: Aluum enforcers are immune to spells and magical abilities, with two exceptions. A negative spell or magical ability grants an aluum enforcer the {@condition quickened} condition until the end of its next turn instead of its normal effects. A positive spell or ability makes an aluum enforcer {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} until the end of its next turn instead of its normal effects.
bot.name: Aluum Antimagic

entries: A creature damaged by the aluum enforcer's fist {@action Strike} must succeed at a DC 27 Fortitude save or become {@condition paralyzed} for 1 round. On a critical failure, the creature is {@condition paralyzed} for {@dice 1d4} minutes and falls {@condition prone}.
bot.name: Paralyzing Force

entries: The aluum enforcer emits a keening wail in a 15-foot cone that deals {@damage 9d6} sonic damage (DC 27 basic Fortitude save). A creature that fails its save is {@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 1}, or stunne.
bot.name: Soul Shriek

entries: By spending 5 minutes concentrating, the calikang can enter a state of suspended animation, freezing in place and becoming motionless but remaining aware of its surroundings. While in this state, the calikang gains a +4 status bonus to all Fortitude saves, does not age, and is immune to disease, inhaled toxins, poison, starvation, and thirst. The calikang can exit suspended animation as a free action. If it exits this state to attack, the calikang gains a +4 circumstance bonus to its initiative roll.
top.name: Suspended Animation

entries: A calikang gains a circumstance bonus to its AC equal to the number of its hands that aren't wielding weapons, to a maximum of +4 (this bonus is already factored into this calikang's stats).
mid.name: Defensive Stance

entries: Whenever the calikang is hit by an electricity spell or rolls a successful save against a spell that deals energy damage, it absorbs the energy. This heals the calikang for an amount of HP equal to quadruple the spell's level, and recharges its Breath Weapon. A calikang can't absorb its own spells this way.
mid.name: Energy Conversion

entries: The calikang breathes a blast of energy that deals {@damage 13d6} energy damage to all creatures in a 60-foot line (DC 28 basic Reflex save). The calikang can choose the damage type each time: acid, cold, electricity, fire, or sonic. Increase the die size to d8 if the calikang chooses electricity.
bot.name: Breath Weapon

entries: The calikang makes up to six fist {@action Strike||Strikes}. Each {@action Strike} can be against a different target.
These attacks count toward its multiple attack penalty, which doesn't increase until after all the attacks are complete.
bot.name: Sixfold Flurry

attacks.name: unholy spiked chain
attacks.damage: {@damage 3d8+14} slashing plus {@damage 1d6} evil and stunning chain

entries: 10 feet. A constant {@spell circle of protection} against good is centered on the horned devil. The horned devil can disable or activate this aura as a single action, which has the {@trait concentrate} trait.
mid.name: Circle of Protection

entries: 100 feet. Lower-level, allied evil creatures in the aura gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, AC, saves, and skill checks.
mid.name: Commander's Aura

entries: 10 feet, DC 34
mid.name: Frightful Presence

bot.requirements: The cornugon hit a creature with its spiked chain on its most recent action this turn
entries: The devil pulls the creature 5 feet closer and grabs it with the spiked chain ({@action Escape} attempts use the cornugon's Athletics DC). The creature is automatically freed if the devil makes another spiked chain attack or moves away.
bot.name: Chain of Malebolge

entries: A cornugon's tail {@action Strike} deals {@damage 4d6} {@condition persistent damage||persistent bleed damage}. The flat check DC to stop the bleeding starts at 20, and is reduced to 15 only if someone successfully assists with the recovery. The DC to {@action Administer First Aid} to a creature with an infernal wound is increased by 10. A spellcaster or item using healing magic on an infernally {@condition wounded} creature must succeed at a DC 34 counteract check or the magic fails to heal the creature.
bot.name: Infernal Wound

entries: If the cornugon critically hits with its spiked chain {@action Strike}, the target must succeed at a DC 34 Fortitude save or be {@condition stunned} for 1 round ({@dice 1d4} rounds on a critical failure).
bot.name: Stunning Chain

abilities: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

entries: +30, {@skill Thievery} +26 Str +4, Dex +7, Con +7, Int +3, Wis +7
top.name: Stealth

entries: Crucidaemons are all but impossible to fool with traps. Whenever a crucidaemon rolls a saving throw against a trap hazard, its degree of success is one better than it rolled.
mid.name: Trap Dodger

entries: When the crucidaemon casts its innate {@spell glyph of warding} spell, it can store any arcane or divine spell of an appropriate level in the glyph, even if it can't otherwise cast the spell.
bot.name: Daemonic Trap Making

entries: The crucidaemon makes two chained dagger {@action Strike||Strikes} against a single target. These attacks count toward the crucidaemon's multiple attack penalty and its multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.
bot.name: Flurry of Daggers

entries: The crucidaemon summons a new chained dagger to replace a destroyed one. A crucidaemon's daggers can't be disarmed, and they become non-magical when severed from the daemon or upon the daemon's death.
bot.name: Manifest Dagger

entries: The first time per turn the duneshaker solifugid moves adjacent to a Large or smaller creature, that creature must succeed at a DC 39 {@skill Acrobatics} check or fall {@condition prone}.
bot.name: Earth Shaker

entries: As giant solifugid (see above).
bot.name: Pounce

entries: The duneshaker solifugid spews toxic barbs at all creatures in a 30-foot cone. Each creature within the cone takes {@damage 10d6} poison damage (DC 39 basic Fortitude save). A creature that fails is {@condition blinded} for {@dice 1d6} rounds (or permanently on a critical failure). The duneshaker solifugid can't use Venom Spray again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Venom Spray

entries: The giant solifugid {@action Stride||Strides} and makes a {@action Strike} at the end of that movement. If the giant solifugid began this action {@condition hidden}, it remains {@condition hidden} until after this ability's {@action Strike}.
bot.name: Pounce

entries: The immortal ichor doesn't age, nor does it need to eat or breathe. It can die only as a result of violence.
mid.name: Immortality

entries: A creature that fails to save against an immortal ichor's {@spell charm} spell becomes {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 1}. The {@condition stupefied} value reduces by 1 every 24 hours. The first time each day a creature {@condition stupefied} by the ichor's charm fails to save against another casting of the ichor's charm, the value of the condition increases by {@dice 1d4}. If the {@condition stupefied} condition ever equals the creature's Wisdom score, it becomes {@condition controlled} by the ichor permanently; if it dies, it rises the next round as a zombie (of the GM's choice) under the ichor's control. If the ichor is killed, these zombies are destroyed.
bot.name: Corrupt Ally

entries: An immortal ichor can cast an initial and advanced domain spell of a domain that belonged to the dead deity from which the ichor arose (the domain spells presented here are from the destruction domain).
bot.name: Dead Spells

entries: A creature hit by the ichor's pseudopod is {@condition stupefied|CRB|stupefied 2} for 1 day unless it succeeds at a DC 35 Will save.
bot.name: Mental Erosion

entries: The immortal ichor draws blood from the pores of living creatures around it. Any living creature within 30 feet that has blood takes {@dice 4d6} damage (DC 33 basic Fortitude save). The immortal ichor regains HP equal to the total damage dealt. A creature that fails its save is also {@condition drained|CRB|drained 1} (or {@condition drained|CRB|drained 2} on a critical failure).
bot.name: Resanguinate

entries: As lamia matriarch.
bot.name: Change Shape
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: '{@action Change Shape|LOAG} As lamia matriarch.' in Ishti, p.47

entries: As lamia matriarch, but 2 actions and using her dagger.
bot.name: Quick Dervish Strike
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Quick Dervish {@action Strike} As lamia matriarch, but 2 actions and using her dagger.' in Ishti, p.47

entries: As lamia matriarch, but DC 40.
bot.name: Matriarch's Caress
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Matriarch's Caress As lamia matriarch, but DC 40.' in Ishti, p.47

entries: Ishti applies a poison to a piercing or slashing weapon of her choice.
bot.name: Poison Weapon

entries: A nalfeshnee's greed is such that losing possessions causes it harm. If an item is stolen from a nalfeshnee, the demon takes {@damage 3d6} mental damage.
mid.name: Forfeiture Aversion

mid.trigger: A creature critically fails a weapon {@action Strike} against the nalfeshnee
entries: The nalfeshnee attempts to {@action Disarm} the weapon used in the triggering {@action Strike} at a –2 circumstance penalty. On a success, the nalfeshnee steals the weapon.
mid.name: Greedy Grab

entries: The nalfeshnee steals all unattended items glowing with its Light of Avarice into an extradimensional space. The demon can {@action Interact} to regurgitate any number of these items into its hand or onto the ground. If the demon dies, is affected by a {@trait teleportation} effect, or consumes an extradimensional space (such as a {@item bag of holding}), it vomits up all the items.
bot.name: ClaimWealth

entries: Beams of unholy light shoot out from the nalfeshnee toward four items within 60 feet. If someone is holding or wearing a targeted item, they can keep it from being affected with a DC 34 Reflex save. For 1 minute, all affected items glow in nauseating colors. Any non-demon is {@condition sickened|CRB|sickened 2} and {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1} as long as it holds, wears, or touches a glowing item. Recovering from this sickness requires a DC 29 Will save instead of a Fortitude save. Ending the sickness in this way ends the {@condition slowed} condition and makes the creature temporarily immune to the Light of Avarice for 24 hours. If the creature removes or drops the item, both the conditions end immediately, but the creature doesn't become immune.
bot.name: Light of Avarice

abilities: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

mid.trigger: The Scarlet Triad boss is the target of a physical ranged attack
entries: They gain a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses and the boss has their shortbow in hand, the boss {@action Strike||Strikes} the attacker with their shortbow.
mid.name: Return Fire

entries: The Scarlet Triad boss {@action Feint||Feints} a target, {@action Stride||Strides} up to their Speed, and makes a {@action Strike} with their shortbow in any order. They can {@action Feint} any target within 30 feet when using this ability.
bot.name: Darting Shot

entries: {@dice 4d6}
bot.name: Sneak Attack

entries: {@action Strike} against the enforcer; The enforcer {@action Strike||Strikes} with their sap against that enemy if they're within reach; otherwise, the enforcer attempts an {@skill Intimidation} check.
mid.name: Stunning Retort

entries: {@action Demoralize} that enemy.
mid.name: to

entries: The enforcer uses the pain of one attack as an opening to deal a devastating second blow. The enforcer makes two attacks against the same target: a scimitar {@action Strike} and sap {@action Strike} (in any order) or two composite shortbow {@action Strike||Strikes}. If both attacks hit, the second attack deals an additional {@dice 3d6} damage, and the enforcer gives the target one of the following conditions until the end of the enforcer's next turn: {@condition dazzled}, {@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 2}, {@condition flat-footed}, or {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1}. This counts as two attacks when calculating the enforcer's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.
bot.name: Dual Abuse

entries: Requirements The enforcer has manacles in hand and is adjacent to a creature; The enforcer attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the manacles. If the enforcer succeeds at an attack roll with a +30 modifier against the target's AC, they apply the manacles.
bot.name: Efficient Capture

abilities: +2 status to all saves vs. arcane magic

entries: Bshez gains a +2 circumstance bonus to initiative rolls.
top.name: Incredible Initiative

entries: Bshez makes two {@action Strike||Strikes}, one with each kukri, using her current multiple attack penalty.
If both attacks hit, combine their damage and add any applicable effects from both weapons. This counts as one attack when calculating her multiple attack penalty.
bot.name: Graceful Double Slice

bot.requirements: Bshez is standing in an area with loose sand or soil
entries: Bshez flings sand into an adjacent creature's eyes. If the target fails a DC 38 Reflex save, they are {@condition dazzled} until the beginning of Bshez's next turn. If they critically fail, they are {@condition blinded} until the beginning of Bshez's next turn. If they succeed, they are unaffected. Regardless of their save, they're temporarily immune until the battle ends.
bot.name: Fling Sand in the Eyes

entries: {@i thundering kukri}
bot.name: Rend

entries: When the target of Bshez's javelin {@action Strike} uses {@feat Shield Block}, the {@action Strike} deals an additional {@dice 4d6} damage to the shield.
bot.name: Shield Breaker

entries: Bshez has access to the critical specialization effects of any weapon she wields.
bot.name: Weapon Master

entries: As aluum enforcer (page 82)
Arcane Innate Spells DC 38; 9th bind soul (×3); 5th locate.
bot.name: Aluum Antimagic

entries: Requirements The spiritbound aluum has bound a soul using its bind soul innate spell; The spiritbound aluum transforms the captured soul's essence into raw magical energy, channeling the spirit into a beam that deals {@damage 20d6} force damage in a 30-foot line (DC 38 basic Reflex save). The remaining fragments of the captured soul are released to the Great Beyond.
The spiritbound aluum can't use Obliteration Beam again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Obliteration Beam

entries: As aluum, but DC 35.
bot.name: Paralyzing Force
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Paralyzing Force As aluum, but DC 35.' in Spiritbound Aluum, p.83

entries: When a spiritbound aluum uses its bind soul innate spell, it binds the soul into its central crystal instead of the normal material component.
The crystal can hold up to 60 souls. When encountered, a spiritbound aluum's crystal typically contains {@dice 1d6} souls.
bot.name: Soul Binder

entries: As aluum enforcer (page 82), but {@dice 16d6} damage.
bot.name: Soul Shriek

entries: As demilich.
top.name: Torpor
top.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Torpor As demilich.' in Teyam Ishtori, p.61

entries: 20 feet; As demilich.
mid.name: Telekinetic Whirlwind
mid.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Telekinetic Whirlwind As demilich.' in Teyam Ishtori, p.61

entries: As demilich.
mid.name: Contingency
mid.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Contingency As demilich.' in Teyam Ishtori, p.61

entries: As demilich.
mid.name: Countermeasures
mid.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Countermeasures As demilich.' in Teyam Ishtori, p.61

entries: As demilich.
bot.name: Demilich Eye Gems
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Demilich Eye Gems As demilich.' in Teyam Ishtori, p.61

entries: As demilich.
bot.name: Devour Soul
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Devour Soul As demilich.' in Teyam Ishtori, p.61

entries: As demilich.
bot.name: Mental Magic
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Mental Magic As demilich.' in Teyam Ishtori, p.61

entries: As demilich, but 10 charges and the spells of a staff of power.
bot.name: Staff Gems
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Staff Gems As demilich, but 10 charges and the spells of a staff of power.' in Teyam Ishtori, p.61

entries: As demilich, but DC 43 Fortitude.
bot.name: Trap Soul
bot.entries_as_xyz: Ability not found: 'Trap Soul As demilich, but DC 43 Fortitude.' in Teyam Ishtori, p.61

abilities: +1 status to all saves vs. positive

creature.name: Uri Zandivar
items: steel shield with +2 greater striking shield spikes (Hardness 5, HP 20, BT 10)

entries: If Uri rolls a success on a Will saving throw, he gets a critical success instead; if he rolls a critical failure on a Will save, he gets a failure instead.
mid.name: Perfect Will

mid.trigger: A creature within Uri's reach fails an attack roll, saving throw, or skill check
entries: Uri makes an unarmed {@action Strike} against the triggering creature. If the attack hits, the target must succeed at a DC 41 Fortitude save or become {@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 3} until the end of its next turn ({@condition enfeebled|CRB|enfeebled 4} on a critical failure).
mid.name: Punish Imperfection

entries: Uri makes two {@action Strike||Strikes}: one with his scimitar and one with his shield spikes. If both hit, the overwhelming power of the attack leaves the target {@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 1} ({@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 2} if one of the {@action Strike||Strikes} was a critical hit, or {@condition stunned|CRB|stunned 3} if both {@action Strike||Strikes} were critical hits). These {@action Strike||Strikes} count as one attack for Uri's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.
bot.name: Slash and Slam

entries: Requirements Uri has manacles in his possession and is adjacent to a creature; Uri sheathes a weapon he's carrying, then attempts to bind the creature's wrists or ankles with the manacles. If Uri succeeds at an attack roll with a +36 modifier against the target's AC, he applies the manacles.
bot.name: Swift Capture

entries: Uri {@action Stride||Strides} and makes a scimitar {@action Strike} at any point during the {@action Stride}.
bot.name: Swift Slash

entries: Uri can use 2 reactions in a round, but he can't perform the same reaction more than once per round.
bot.name: Reactionary

notes: one or more Lore skills related to a specific plane

entries: The witchwyrd uses a free hand to "catch" a single {@i magic missile} fired at it, as long as it is aware of the incoming {@i magic missile}. This absorbs the missile and causes that hand to glow while it holds this energy. A hand that's holding energy can't be used for any other purpose except to use Force Bolt. The energy lasts for 6 rounds or until it is released.
mid.name: Absorb Force

entries: The witchwyrd fires one {@i magic missile} per action spent (dealing {@dice 1d4+1} damage each). It can't spend more actions on this ability than it has free hands. If it uses a hand that has Absorbed Force, that hand hurls two missiles instead of one, expending the held energy.
bot.name: Force Bolt

attacks.name: jaws
attacks.damage: {@damage 4d8+9} piercing plus {@damage 2d8} {@condition persistent damage||persistent fire} and Grab

entries: 60 feet, DC 36
top.name: Frightful Presence

entries: When a Xotanispawn dies, it explodes, dealing {@damage 15d8} fire damage to creatures in a 30-foot emanation (DC 39 basic Reflex save).
mid.name: Explosion

mid.trigger: A creature adjacent to the Xotanispawn touches it or hits it with a physical attack
entries: The triggering creature takes {@damage 5d8} {@condition persistent damage||persistent fire damage} (DC 37 Reflex save to negate).
mid.name: Internal Furnace

entries: The Xotanispawn sprays a 60-foot cone of magma that deals {@damage 10d10} fire damage and {@damage 2d6} {@condition persistent damage||persistent fire damage} to all creatures in the area (DC 39 basic Reflex save). The Xotanispawn can't use its Breath Weapon again for {@dice 1d4} rounds.
bot.name: Breath Weapon

entries: When the Xotanispawn critically hits, its body surges with heat, increasing the damage of its Internal Furnace to {@dice 10d8} until the start of its next turn.
bot.name: Heat Surge

entries: The Zephyr Guard attempts to {@action Disarm} a creature, with a +2 circumstance bonus to the roll. On a critical success, the guard can also deal their scimitar damage to the creature.
bot.name: Adroit Disarm

entries: The Zephyr Guard makes a heavy crossbow {@action Strike} that deals one additional weapon damage die. If the {@action Strike} hits, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds and is {@condition slowed|CRB|slowed 1}.
These last for 1 round, or 2 rounds if the {@action Strike} was a critical success.
bot.name: Hampering Shot

entries: A Zephyr Guard takes no penalty for making nonlethal attacks with a weapon that doesn't have the {@trait nonlethal} trait. The guard's nonlethal {@action Strike||Strikes} against a creature that is not wielding a weapon deal an additional {@dice 2d6} damage.
bot.name: Subduing Strikes
